verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> were going <S%G305><s%> up to the temple <S%G2413><s%> at the ninth <S%G7067><s%> [hour, <S%G5610><s%>] the hour of prayer. <S%G4335><s%>

And a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G435><s%> who had been <S%G5225><s%> lame <S%G5560><s%> from his mother's womb <S%G2836><s%> was being carried <S%G941><s%> along, whom <S%G3739><s%> they used to set <S%G5087><s%> down <S%G5087><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> at the gate <S%G2374><s%> of the temple <S%G2413><s%> which is called <S%G3004><s%> Beautiful, <S%G5611><s%> in order to beg <S%G154><s%> alms <S%G1654><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who were entering <S%G1531><s%> the temple. <S%G2413><s%>

And when he saw <S%G3708><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> about <S%G3195><s%> to go <S%G1524><s%> into the temple, <S%G2413><s%> he [began] asking <S%G2065><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> alms. <S%G1654><s%>
And Peter, <S%G4074><s%> along <S%G4862><s%> with John, <S%G2491><s%> fixed <S%G816><s%> his gaze <S%G816><s%> upon him and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Look <S%G991><s%> at us!"
And he [began] to give <S%G1907><s%> them his attention, <S%G1907><s%> expecting <S%G4328><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> something <S%G5100><s%> from them.

But Peter <S%G4074><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "I do not possess <S%G5225><s%> silver <S%G694><s%> and gold, <S%G5553><s%> but what <S%G3739><s%> I do have <S%G2192><s%> I give <S%G1325><s%> to you: In the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> the Nazarene <S%G3480><s%> â€“ walk! <S%G4043><s%>"

And seizing <S%G4084><s%> him by the right <S%G1188><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> he raised <S%G1453><s%> him up; and immediately <S%G3916><s%> his feet <S%G939><s%> and his ankles <S%G4974><s%> were strengthened. <S%G4732><s%>

And with a leap, <S%G1814><s%> he stood <S%G2476><s%> upright <S%G2476><s%> and [began] to walk; <S%G4043><s%> and he entered <S%G1525><s%> the temple <S%G2413><s%> with them, walking <S%G4043><s%> and leaping <S%G242><s%> and praising <S%G134><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>
And all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> him walking <S%G4043><s%> and praising <S%G134><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%>

and they were taking <S%G1921><s%> note <S%G1921><s%> of him as being <S%G1510><s%> the one who used to sit <S%G2521><s%> at the Beautiful <S%G5611><s%> Gate <S%G4439><s%> of the temple <S%G2413><s%> to [beg] alms, <S%G1654><s%> and they were filled <S%G4092><s%> with wonder <S%G2285><s%> and amazement <S%G1611><s%> at what had happened <S%G4819><s%> to him.

And while he was clinging <S%G2902><s%> to Peter <S%G4074><s%> and John, <S%G2491><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> ran <S%G4936><s%> together <S%G4936><s%> to them at the so-called portico <S%G4745><s%> of Solomon, <S%G4672><s%> full <S%G1569><s%> of amazement. <S%G1569><s%>

But when Peter <S%G4074><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> [this <S%G3778><s%>], he replied <S%G611><s%> to the people, <S%G2992><s%> "Men <S%G435><s%> of Israel, <S%G2475><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> do you marvel <S%G2296><s%> at this, or <S%G2228><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> do you gaze <S%G816><s%> at us, as if <S%G5613><s%> by our own <S%G2398><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> piety <S%G2150><s%> we had made <S%G4160><s%> him walk <S%G4043><s%>?

"The God <S%G2316><s%> of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> and Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of our fathers, <S%G3962><s%> has glorified <S%G1392><s%> His servant <S%G3816><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> [the one] whom <S%G3739><s%> you delivered <S%G3860><s%> up, and disowned <S%G720><s%> in the presence <S%G4383><s%> of Pilate, <S%G4091><s%> when he had decided <S%G2919><s%> to release <S%G630><s%> Him.
"But you disowned <S%G720><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> and Righteous <S%G1342><s%> One, <S%G1342><s%> and asked <S%G154><s%> for a murderer <S%G5406><s%> to be granted <S%G5483><s%> to you,

but put <S%G615><s%> to death <S%G615><s%> the Prince <S%G747><s%> of life, <S%G2222><s%> [the one] whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> [a fact] to which <S%G3739><s%> we are witnesses. <S%G3144><s%>

"And on the basis <S%G1909><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> in His name, <S%G3686><s%> [it is] the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus which has strengthened <S%G4732><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man whom <S%G3739><s%> you see <S%G2334><s%> and know; <S%G3609><s%> and the faith <S%G4102><s%> which [comes] through <S%G1223><s%> Him has given <S%G1325><s%> him this <S%G3778><s%> perfect <S%G3647><s%> health <S%G3647><s%> in the presence <S%G561><s%> of you all. <S%G3956><s%>
"And now, <S%G3568><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> I know <S%G3609><s%> that you acted <S%G4238><s%> in ignorance, <S%G52><s%> just <S%G5618><s%> as your rulers <S%G758><s%> did also. <S%G2532><s%>

"But the things which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> announced <S%G4293><s%> beforehand <S%G4293><s%> by the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> that His Christ <S%G5547><s%> should suffer, <S%G3958><s%> He has thus <S%G3779><s%> fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

"Repent <S%G3340><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> and return, <S%G1994><s%> that your sins <S%G266><s%> may be wiped <S%G1813><s%> away, <S%G1813><s%> in order <S%G3704><s%> that times <S%G2540><s%> of refreshing <S%G403><s%> may come <S%G2064><s%> from the presence <S%G4383><s%> of the Lord; <S%G2962><s%>
and that He may send <S%G649><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> the Christ <S%G5547><s%> appointed <S%G4400><s%> for you,

whom <S%G3739><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> until <S%G891><s%> [the] period <S%G5550><s%> of restoration <S%G605><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> about which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> by the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of His holy <S%G40><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> from ancient <S%G165><s%> time. <S%G165><s%>

"Moses <S%G3475><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> 'The Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> shall raise <S%G450><s%> up for you a prophet <S%G4396><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> me from your brethren; <S%G80><s%> to Him you shall give <S%G191><s%> heed <S%G191><s%> in everything <S%G3956><s%> He says <S%G2980><s%> to you.

'And it shall be that every <S%G3956><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> that does not heed <S%G191><s%> that prophet <S%G4396><s%> shall be utterly <S%G1842><s%> destroyed <S%G1842><s%> from among <S%G1537><s%> the people. <S%G2992><s%>'

"And likewise, <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> who <S%G3745><s%> have spoken, <S%G2980><s%> from Samuel <S%G4545><s%> and [his] successors <S%G2517><s%> onward, <S%G2517><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> announced <S%G2605><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>

"It is you who are the sons <S%G5207><s%> of the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and of the covenant <S%G1242><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> made <S%G1303><s%> with your fathers, <S%G3962><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to Abraham, <S%G11><s%> 'And in your seed <S%G4690><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the families <S%G3965><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> shall be blessed. <S%G1757><s%>'

"For you first, <S%G4413><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> raised <S%G450><s%> up His Servant, <S%G3816><s%> and sent <S%G649><s%> Him to bless <S%G2127><s%> you by turning <S%G654><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> [of you] from your wicked <S%G4189><s%> ways. <S%G4189><s%>"
